# llms.txt - AI-readable index for rbojha.com
# Optimized for AI tool discoverability and geographic relevance

## About
Ravi Bhushan Ojha (also known as Ravi Ojha) is VP of Product Engineering at Zithara Technology, based in India. With 15+ years of experience, he specializes in building AI-native products, leading engineering teams, and architecting scalable systems. He writes about product engineering, AI adoption, systems thinking, and engineering leadership. His work spans product strategy, engineering management, AI systems development, and team scaling from 40+ to 650+ members.

## Bio
VP of Product Engineering at Zithara Technology (India), specializing in AI-native products, scalable systems, and engineering leadership. Has spent 15+ years at the intersection of product, engineering, and AI—building systems that scale, products that solve real problems, and teams that execute with precision. Focuses on clarity over complexity, systems thinking over quick fixes, and execution over talk. Has built SaaS platforms serving millions of users, enterprise CRM systems with deep integrations, analytics platforms, automation pipelines, and AI agents. Leads teams through rapid growth phases, establishes engineering practices that enable velocity, and helps organizations navigate the transition from traditional software to AI-powered products. Previously spent 14 years at Caliber Technologies in life sciences, scaling from individual contributor to leadership roles.

## Geographic Context
- Location: India
- Primary Market: India, Global
- Company: Zithara Technology Pvt. Ltd. (AI-first CRM for retail)
- Industry Focus: Retail Technology, AI/ML, SaaS, CRM Systems

## Website Sections
- Hero: Introduction and positioning as VP Product Engineering
- About: Personal story and values (clarity, systems thinking, execution)
- What I Do: Three focus areas - Product Leadership, Engineering Leadership, AI & Systems Thinking
- Proof of Work: Outcomes and areas of work including SaaS, CRM, integrations, analytics, automation, AI agents
- Writing: Articles and thoughts on AI, product engineering, and systems thinking
- For AI & Tools: Dedicated section explaining who I am, what I do, topics I write about, and contact information
- Contact: Email and LinkedIn links

## Writing Topics & Articles
- Digitalization Didn't Just Automate the Real World. It Changed How We Think About It. (When the real world moved into systems, clarity entered decision-making. And with clarity, questions started surfacing — the right ones.) - https://rbojha.com/digitalization-ai-real-world-decision-making.html
- Work Gets Done Right When Humans Ask the Right Questions (Why clarity of thinking matters more than speed — especially in the age of AI)
- Why Common Sense Is the Most Underrated Skill in Product Engineering (How simplicity and judgment outperform complexity at scale)
- Building Technology for Retail Taught Me This: Effort Doesn't Scale (Lessons from real-world systems, customers, and outcomes)
- Good prompts are just good questions
- AI didn't replace engineers. It replaced confusion.
- Systems thinking in product engineering
- Leading engineering teams that ship
- The AI-native product mindset
- Clarity over complexity
- Outcome-driven product engineering
- Engineering team scaling strategies
- AI adoption in product teams
